reviews.review: 匹配机制纯nt，玩人就完事了，喜欢天天跟4红车队打就玩屠

2019年時就在玩這遊戲了！玩到現在2021了！講實話很糟糕！很爛的技能機制、不公平的配對、沒道理的維修速度，目前這遊戲鬧鬼荒很嚴重，沒人遊玩殺手(鬼)，扮演人類時，都要等很久！尤其是07：00PM以後。
因殺手的技能大多都削弱，導致目前殺手各個幾乎都統一化，少了自我特色！
其實官方只要把人類維修發電機的速度做調整就可以解決目前沒人遊玩殺手(鬼)的問題了！但官方偏偏無法理解！
地圖很少~看是很多地圖其實還好！希望能多出一點地圖~
Playing this game in 2019! Play now 2021! Honestly it sucks! Terrible skill mechanics, unfair matchmaking, and unreasonable repair speed. At present, this game is very haunted. No one plays killer (ghost), and it takes a long time to play as a human! Especially after 07:00PM.
Because most of the killer's skills are weakened, the current killers are almost unified, and their own characteristics are missing!
In fact, the official only needs to adjust the speed of human maintenance generators to solve the problem of no one playing killer (ghost) at present! But the official is not willing!
Very few maps! Wish there were more maps
2019年にこのゲームをプレイ！ 今すぐプレイ2021！ 正直なところ、それは最悪です！ ひどいスキルメカニッ​​ク、不公平なマッチメイキング、そして無理な修理スピード。現在、このゲームは非常に幽霊が出ています。誰もキラー（ゴースト）をプレイせず、人間としてプレイするには長い時間がかかります！ 特に07:00PM以降。
キラーのスキルのほとんどが弱まっているため、現在のキラーはほぼ統一されており、彼ら自身の特徴が欠けています！
実際、オフィシャルは、現在キラー（ゴースト）をプレイしていないという問題を解決するために、人間のメンテナンスジェネレーターの速度を調整するだけで済みます！ しかし、役人は喜んでいません！
マップはほとんどありません！ もっと地図があったらいいのに
Dead by daylight is for people who love slasher games and horror I love playing ghostface and scaring innocent survivors i do recommend if you are a horror head like me!
I think l was a party good job so far

Heroes of Newarth was probably the most supportive and super-friendly community centered around a casual game that I've had the pleasure of playing with... too bad League killed that gem of a game with it's slightly friendlier community I especially enjoyed playing with the Brazilians and was totally bummed when they all moved to their own server. Dead by Daylight helps to fill the void with it's super helpful and friendly community, only rivaled by the community in Final Fantasy 14 ARR with it's helpfulness and amazing people.
Капец токсичное комьюнити, после каждой 3 игры ошибка, короче хз, а David King токсик лютый ебать:)
Great game, consistently updated with nice features

If you ever felt like becoming and playing as the most Legendary Killers of all time this is the game to do it if you ever felt like playing the Survivor this is the game to do it there are some killers in here that feel a bit nerfed like Demo but the other big boys like Ghostface, Mike, and Jigsaw are very fun to play
我  是  聪  明   逼
No sé por qué no descubrí este juego cuando fue lanzado, es el mejor que he jugado, a mi gusto <3
Todos usan barbacoa y chile, no hay chances. Esta muy desequilibrado. Los asesinos de pago son muy chetados. La pase bien un tiempo pero ya me canse.
so good game so fun sometimes scary wow.
very fun needs a lil work but good game
想當年學個聽音辨位，360轉，果斷賣朋友的，也是個好遊戲
Muy entretenido la verdad, la variedad de supervivientes, asesinos y habilidades de los personajes junto con los mapas le da un tono fresco al juego en su totalidad, super recomendado
po se você quiser virar um daqueles gamers dissimulados que quebram o monitor no soco e tacam o teclado na casa da vizinha esse é o jogo perfeito pra você!

Very fun game, however it is best when you have someone to play with. If you play as a survivor it is hard to find people who cooperate with each other. Unfortunately the community is a bit toxic... the only downside to this game. However when I play it with friends it is funny and we have a great time!

Desativando o chat e ignorando toda a toxicidade, esse jogo é bom. A comunidade é bem tóxica, mas só saber jogar com as pessoas certas e manter o chat desativado. O maior problema ao meu ver, é a má otimização do jogo e a quantidade absurda de bugs, pra um jogo que tem 5 anos, é uma vergonha! E a Behaviour não está nem aí, só quer lucrar e não arruma nada direito. Vide o mapa de Raccoon City que mal lançou e já foi retirado por conta de bugs e até hoje não foi arrumado

I have loved this game since i got it I only have around 65 hours on PC but when i played on console i had at least 1000 this game is one of the games that has something new each round you play. I would recommend this game to anyone.
Bonito juego para jugar con amigos y hacerlos sentir miedo, desesperación y terror absoluto. Mientras tú personificas tus problemas mentales

A few years ago I'd have gladly recommended this game. But since then, the leftover player base is comprised of mostly toxic people; I don't mean toxic in terms of bigoted language, but toxic in terms of playstyle. 

Survivors abide by an unspoken set of rules that, if you violate as a killer, they will make your life miserable. And if the killer is having a bad day, they can make survivor's lives miserable.

It's hard to delve into specifics in a review since the presumed audience hasn't bought the game yet, but it's mostly things like t-bagging, camping survivors, and finding any excuse to ream you in chat.

If you become a skilled killer you can eventually put toxic teams in their place-- and that is satisfying. But no amount of being a skilled survivor will help you survive; you're still at the mercy of your teammates and crossing fingers you've got a cool killer.

And for what? The typical carrot-on-the-end-of-a-string; unlocking abilities and perks that skew the matches in one way or another, or cosmetics. 

I would not recommend this game to new players unless you have a group of friends you want to try it with. If you decide not to heed this review and buy it anyway, I suggest you get into meditation and take breaks every 30 minutes.
Brilliant game. fast fun matches to play with friends and brilliant characters and killers to choose from. Very addictive :)
Excellent game. The different killer and player perks makes each game exciting and addictive. Definitely worth buying
Malisimo, los servidores van para el ojete y enserio, quien fue el genio que pensó en usar el mismo botón para auto curación y la trampilla?
The game is such an unbalanced mess i wouldnt even bother playing killer anymore survivors just have the ability to control so much in the game and hacking is such a major issue that still isnt fixed
Игра топ, вполне хороший онлайн иногда могут быть игроки не твоего уровня но все же рекомендую
10把3把结算异常把我血点（周年蛋糕+辣条）吞了，这破服务器什么时候搞好，还有SB的匹配机制

The players on this game are incredibly toxic and the developers refuse to do anything about it. If you're not hacking or throwing around racial slurs, you can't get in trouble. Even things that in game are listed as 'reportable offenses', if you check the forums, they flat out say, don't bother reporting, we won't do anything about it. Online toxicity and bullying kills people. Do they care? Apparently not.
Ótimo jogo de pega-pega, além de personagens exclusivos existe uma leva de personagens famosos de franquias consagradas de Terror.

The game lacks polish in some areas (but they're working on it), there are a lot of bugs (but they do get ironed out eventually), and there's a ton of toxicity (which they're supposedly working on), but overall I wouldn't have 1000+ hours in this game if it wasn't fun and that's really all that matters for a game.

This game is quiet fun. Even with any bugs or the mmr being freaky as heck. I definitely dont recommend if you have extreme anxiety but if its mild this may be a game you wanna try out. Its pretty addicted too especially when you play with friends who suck equally as much as you lol.
Very good games like any game always bugs but it is a nice challenging game begginer  scares but fun to get good at

I can not recommend this game for the life of me I paid about 10 dollars for this game and I still have to pay for more characters in the game? makes no sense and every character cost about 5 dollars. the game is fun but you only get like 5% of the characters so you cant even compete because some of them got op skills like lether face with his one-hit kill with a chainsaw.

There's no reason to buy this game save your money and give it to a game that does not try to milk the shit out of your pockets.

I have put more hours into this game and its still trash.
fun lvl up your killers then you kill ppl
stop saying this game needs voice chat, it really doesn't
menudo matchmakin de puta mierda teneis, un rango 17 en killer no se puede enfrentar a un rango uno, si esta comunidad es toxica y motivos no faltan  payasos
Muy buen juego entretenido lo recomiendo para jugar con amigos y divertirse

El juego es muy bueno en si, tiene una tematica que no cualquier juego lo tiene, es divertido y puedes jugar con amigos. Lo malo es que los asesinos a partir del nivel 6 son tuneleros (campean al superviviente que cuelgan) y eso le quita la gracia al juego siendo superviviente pero es recomendado
